title: Mapo Tofu

ingredients.ingredient: spicy bean paste 辣豆瓣醬
chopped fermented black beans 豆豉
chicken stock (or water with chicken essence)

steps: Toast Sichuan peppercorns under low heat until fragrant. Then remove from pan and crush them up for garnish later.
Cut tofu into big cubes. Simmer in boiling water for a couple of minutes to remove the smell. Then drain the water.
Stir fry the minced beef over medium heat for 3-4 minutes. When it just turns brown, add black pepper and stir. Set aside when the beef is cooked.
Add peppercorn oil, spicy bean paste, minced ginger and garlic to the pan. Stir fry for 1 minute.
Add fermented black beans and continue to stir fry until the spicy bean paste releases the red oil.
Add in the beef and mix well.
Add chicken stock and dark soy sauce.
When the sauce starts to simmer, add in the tofu. Cook at low heat for 3 minutes.
Add sugar and chilli oil to taste. Add cornstarch solution to thicken up the sauce.
Add spring onions and sichuan peppercorns and cook for 30 seconds.
Add a dash of sesame oil and serve.
